title: Action Learning Implementation Strategies to Facilitate Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental organizational management concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasis on organizational improvement capabilities through practical problem-solving, with collaborative environments built using digital tools

learning_goals: Develop concrete action plans applicable to real workplace problems within an action learning framework.

Within one week, learners will identify at least three organizational learning mechanisms (knowledge sharing, feedback routines, post-action reviews) in team-based problem-solving simulations and submit a plan incorporating one agreed-upon management strategy per team.

Learners will use a linked strategy between management control systems (KPI monitoring) and action learning (team-based problem-solving projects) to submit a departmental sustainable learning culture design proposal within one week, including three core elements: goal setting, implementation plan, and evaluation system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
